Title: Relates to establishing a revolving fund for the establishment of municipal internet service providers; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a revolving fund for the establishment of municipal internet service providers; appropriates $250 million therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง99-m, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing a revolving fund for the establishment of municipal internet service providers; and making an appropriation therefor
